meanings.definition: Concerned with his clothes and appearance in an affected and excessive way.
meanings.sent1: The foppish gentleman spent hours choosing the perfect outfit for the party.
meanings.sent2: He always looked foppish in his brightly colored suits and fancy hats.
meanings.sent3: The foppish man's wardrobe was so extravagant that it made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her foppish style was like a peacock showing off its feathers.
meanings.sent5: The foppish dresser stood out in a sea of casually dressed individuals.

meanings.definition: A man who is excessively concerned with his clothes and appearance.
meanings.sent1: The foppish was the talk of the town with his elaborate outfits.
meanings.sent2: Everyone knew him as the foppish who never wore the same outfit twice.
meanings.sent3: The foppish's obsession with fashion was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: He was a foppish in a world of simple dressers, like a peacock among sparrows.
meanings.sent5: The foppish's attire was so extravagant that it seemed like a costume at times.
